name: HD Black and White Kappa
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
Just a better black and white Kappa emote then the current one twitch uses. :) ATTENTION: This style REQUIRES BTTV to function properly. If you do not have BTTV, you will not see the HD Black and White Kappa face. Get BTTV at: http://www.nightdev.com/betterttv

user.name: CodyMKW
user.about: Hey my name is Cody I’m 31 years old I like to play Nintendo games, and I’m a former member of the retired Splatoon team known as Squids Next Door my favorite game series are Mario Kart, Animal Crossing, and Splatoon.
